summary: OCCASIONALLY, WHILE DRIVING A WARNING CHIME SOUNDS AND POWER STEERING FAILS.  IT BECOMES VERY DIFFICULT TO STEER THE TRUCK AND TWO WARNINGS ARE DISPLAYED, "POWER STEERING DISABLED" AND "STABILITRAK OFF". IF I PULL OVER, STOP, AND TURN OFF THE ENGINETHE PROBLEM CLEARS UPON RESTART.  THIS IS INCREDIBLY DANGEROUS.  THE PROBLEM HAS OCCURRED WHILE DRIVING SLOWLY AND AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  IT IS HAPPENING MORE FREQUENTLY WITH INCREASING MILEAGE.  CURRENT MILEAGE IS 70K BUT HAS BEEN HAPPENING SINCE ABOUT 40K.
